clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Low Level Laser Therapy on Pain Occurring After Insertion of an Orthodontic Device
clinical_study.official_title: Monocentric, Randomized, Single Blinded Study Designed to Evaluate the Effect of Low Level Laser Therapy on Pain Occurring After Insertion of an Orthodontic Device : the "Quadhelix"

brief_summary.textblock:
Thus study consists of evaluating the effect of low level therapy on pain induced by insertion of an orthodontic device (the "quadhelix"). Each day during the first seven days post procedure, the level of pain will be reported on an analogic visual scale.
As secondary objectives, intake of antalgics and type of swallowed food (soft or tough) will also be daily registered.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patient will be randomized into one of the 3 following arms :
- arm 1 (experimental) : administration of Low Level Laser Therapy just after insertion of the quadhelix.
- arm 2 (sham procedure) : material necessary to perform Low Level Laser Therapy will be installed but the laser will not be activated.
- arm 3 (no intervention): material necessary to perform Low Level Laser Therapy will NOT be installed

primary_outcome.measure: to evaluate the effect of low level laser therapy on pain induced by insertion of the quadhelix (orthodontic device)
primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline pain at 7 days
primary_outcome.description: Each day during the first week post procedure, patient will record intensity of his/her pain on an analogic visual scale

secondary_outcome.measure: effect of low level laser therapy on intake of antalgics
secondary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline antalgics intake at 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: Each day during the first week post procedure, patient will record his/her intake of antalgics

secondary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline quality of food intake at 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: Each day during the first week post procedure, patient will answer (on a questionnaire) to questions concerning his/her intake of food (type of food (soft or not)).

clinical_study.condition: Bad Molar Teeth Arrangement Requiring Orthodontic Device

arm_group.description: Low level laser (970nm) will be delivered on the mucous membrane in regard to the first molar teeth on which rings of the quadhelix have been settled.
Same procedure than experimental arm except that the laser is not activated.
no intervention : Patient received the quadhelix with nothing else

intervention.other_name: low level laser therapy (970nm) (SIROLaser advance material of SIRONA dental systems laboratory)
Same intervention than experimental arm except that the laser is not activated

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children aged between 8 and 15 years old who need to receive an orthodontic device ("quadhelix)
- informed consent form signed by parents who should be affiliated to French health insurance (french Social security)
Exclusion Criteria:
- malignant facial tumor
- not able to read or write correctly and thus not able to complete the questionnaire
- allergic or intolerant to paracetamol
- Informed consent not obtained
